name: Bareen Krill
content: Bareen Krill was a female Er'Kit pirate who was a member of the Nihil during the High Republic Era. Alongside her sister Sabata, Bareen was a member of a cell led by Krix Kamerat, a protégé of Eye of the Nihil Marchion Ro. The Krill sisters participated in an attack by the cell on Takodana. As the attack was beginning, Kamerat suspected one of the sisters of being the person he had overheard expressing concern about carrying out the attack because of the Jedi presence on the planet, but the speaker did not identify themselves. After the Jedi Sav Malagán repelled the first wave of the attack, she found the Krill sisters lying amidst the debris in the forest, whereupon they asked for help.
